Distribution

Oxyscelio florus was originally described from Japan, and the recent redescription of Burks et al. 2013 had only Japanese specimens. The new data greatly extend the distribution of the species: it occurs widely in China from Hebei in the north, to Zhejiang, and to southern Hunan and Guangdong in the south. Link to dynamic distribution map：http://hol.osu.edu/map-large.html?id=243848
